project_description: Comprehensive multi-label classifier for basketball shooting form analysis. Analyzes 18 distinct aspects of shooting mechanics including hand positioning, body mechanics, release phases, and shot types. Designed for production-grade biomechanical analysis with detailed labels for coaching feedback.

categories.name: shooting_hand_mechanics
categories.description: Analysis of shooting hand wrist, finger, and palm positioning during shot execution

labels.name: optimal_wrist_snap
labels.description: Full wrist flexion with 90+ degree snap, creates ideal backspin

labels.name: good_wrist_action
labels.description: Strong wrist snap with 70-89 degree flexion, adequate backspin

labels.name: moderate_wrist_action
labels.description: Moderate wrist flexion, some backspin but inconsistent

labels.name: limited_wrist_snap
labels.description: Minimal wrist flexion, insufficient backspin generation

labels.name: stiff_wrist
labels.description: Very limited or no wrist flexion, poor shot control

categories.name: guide_hand_placement
categories.description: Non-shooting hand positioning and influence on ball trajectory

labels.name: perfect_side_placement
labels.description: Guide hand on side of ball, no interference with release

labels.name: good_side_support
labels.description: Slight angle but mostly on side, minimal influence

labels.name: slight_thumb_interference
labels.description: Guide hand thumb slightly affects trajectory

labels.name: moderate_interference
labels.description: Guide hand noticeably affects shot direction

labels.name: severe_two_hand_push
labels.description: Both hands pushing ball, major trajectory issues

categories.name: elbow_alignment
categories.description: Shooting arm elbow positioning relative to shoulder and target

labels.name: perfect_inline
labels.description: Elbow directly under ball, perfectly aligned with target

labels.name: excellent_alignment
labels.description: Elbow nearly inline, minimal lateral deviation

labels.name: good_with_minor_wing
labels.description: Slight elbow wing, still functional mechanics

labels.name: moderate_elbow_wing
labels.description: Noticeable lateral elbow deviation, affects accuracy

labels.name: severe_chicken_wing
labels.description: Extreme elbow deviation, major mechanical flaw

categories.name: shoulder_position
categories.description: Shoulder alignment, level, and rotation during shot execution

labels.name: level_squared_shoulders
labels.description: Shoulders level and square to target throughout

labels.name: slight_natural_turn
labels.description: Minor natural shoulder turn, still balanced

labels.name: moderate_shoulder_drop
labels.description: Noticeable shoulder tilt, affects release consistency

labels.name: significant_rotation
labels.description: Excessive shoulder rotation or tilt, major issue

labels.name: extreme_misalignment
labels.description: Severe shoulder imbalance, compensatory mechanics

categories.name: finger_release
categories.description: Finger positioning on ball and release mechanics for backspin generation

labels.name: perfect_fingertip_release
labels.description: Ball released from fingertips, index/middle finger last touch

labels.name: good_finger_control
labels.description: Strong fingertip control with consistent backspin

labels.name: moderate_palm_contact
labels.description: Some palm involvement, reduces feel and control

labels.name: excessive_palm_grip
labels.description: Too much ball in palm, limited finger control

labels.name: palm_shot
labels.description: Shot pushed from palm, minimal backspin

categories.name: follow_through
categories.description: Arm and wrist extension after ball release, gooseneck formation

labels.name: full_gooseneck_hold
labels.description: Complete arm extension with held gooseneck position

labels.name: complete_extension
labels.description: Full arm extension with brief hold

labels.name: moderate_followthrough
labels.description: Adequate extension but quick return

labels.name: shortened_followthrough
labels.description: Abbreviated extension, affects consistency

labels.name: no_followthrough
labels.description: Immediate arm retraction, poor shot control

categories.name: lower_body_knee_bend
categories.description: Knee flexion depth and power generation from legs

labels.name: optimal_athletic_bend
labels.description: Ideal knee flexion for power and balance

labels.name: good_bend_range
labels.description: Adequate knee flexion for power generation

labels.name: moderate_bend
labels.description: Less optimal knee bend, reduces power

labels.name: shallow_bend
labels.description: Minimal knee flexion, mostly arm shooting

labels.name: no_leg_involvement
labels.description: Straight legs, all arm power, inconsistent range

categories.name: hip_rotation
categories.description: Hip and torso rotation, core stability during shot

labels.name: stable_minimal_rotation
labels.description: Hips stable and square to target throughout

labels.name: controlled_slight_turn
labels.description: Minor natural hip turn, maintains balance

labels.name: moderate_rotation
labels.description: Noticeable hip rotation, affects shot direction

labels.name: excessive_turn
labels.description: Significant hip rotation, major alignment issue

labels.name: severe_misalignment
labels.description: Extreme hip rotation or instability

categories.name: foot_placement
categories.description: Foot positioning, stance width, and base stability

labels.name: optimal_shoulder_width
labels.description: Feet shoulder-width apart, balanced stance

labels.name: slightly_wide_narrow
labels.description: Minor deviation from optimal width, still stable

labels.name: moderately_wide_narrow
labels.description: Noticeable stance width issue, affects balance

labels.name: very_wide_narrow
labels.description: Extreme stance width, major balance concerns

labels.name: unstable_base
labels.description: Feet together or extremely wide, no foundation

categories.name: balance_stability
categories.description: Overall body balance and weight transfer during shot

labels.name: perfect_balance
labels.description: Centered weight, lands in same spot, no drift

labels.name: well_balanced
labels.description: Minimal movement, good body control

labels.name: slight_imbalance
labels.description: Minor weight shift or drift during shot

labels.name: moderate_instability
labels.description: Noticeable drift or weight transfer issue

labels.name: poor_balance
labels.description: Significant drift, fading, or loss of control

categories.name: ball_positioning
categories.description: Ball starting position and hand grip configuration

labels.name: optimal_forehead_pocket
labels.description: Ball starts at forehead level, ideal shooting pocket

labels.name: high_shoulder_start
labels.description: Ball starts above shoulder, slightly high release

labels.name: chest_level_start
labels.description: Ball starts at chest, requires more lift

labels.name: low_waist_start
labels.description: Ball dips to waist, extra motion increases variance

labels.name: extreme_low_high
labels.description: Ball starts below waist or above head, inefficient

categories.name: release_point_arc
categories.description: Ball release height and trajectory arc angle

labels.name: optimal_high_arc
labels.description: Perfect release angle, ideal basket entry

labels.name: good_arc_range
labels.description: Effective arc angle, good make percentage

labels.name: moderate_arc
labels.description: Acceptable but less optimal arc

labels.name: flat_high_trajectory
labels.description: Suboptimal arc reduces target size

labels.name: line_drive_rainbow
labels.description: Extreme arc angle, very low success rate

categories.name: shooting_phase
categories.description: Current phase of shot execution for phase-specific analysis

labels.name: pre_shot_stance
labels.description: Ready position before shot initiation

labels.name: dip_loading
labels.description: Downward ball movement and knee bend

labels.name: rise_elevation
labels.description: Upward movement toward release

labels.name: release_point
labels.description: Ball leaving shooting hand

labels.name: follow_through_phase
labels.description: Post-release arm extension

labels.name: recovery_landing
labels.description: Return to ready position

categories.name: shot_type
categories.description: Classification of shooting motion type and context

labels.name: jump_shot
labels.description: Standard jump shot with vertical leap

labels.name: set_shot
labels.description: Shot from standing position, no jump

labels.name: free_throw
labels.description: Uncontested shot from free throw line

labels.name: catch_and_shoot
labels.description: Shot immediately after receiving pass

labels.name: off_dribble
labels.description: Shot following dribble moves

labels.name: fadeaway
labels.description: Shot with backward lean or under pressure

categories.name: body_type_adjustment
categories.description: Adjustments and considerations for different physical profiles

labels.name: tall_shooter
labels.description: High release point, longer lever arms

labels.name: average_height
labels.description: Standard proportions and mechanics

labels.name: shorter_shooter
labels.description: Quicker release, higher arc needed

labels.name: long_wingspan
labels.description: Extended reach affects shooting pocket

labels.name: short_wingspan
labels.description: Compensatory adjustments needed

labels.name: athletic_style
labels.description: Fast, athletic shooting motion

labels.name: fundamental_style
labels.description: Traditional, methodical shooting form

categories.name: common_errors
categories.description: Detection of frequent shooting mistakes and compensations

labels.name: no_errors_detected
labels.description: Clean shooting form without common flaws

labels.name: thumb_flick
labels.description: Thumb on shooting hand affects ball trajectory

labels.name: guide_hand_push
labels.description: Non-shooting hand influences shot direction

labels.name: dip_inconsistency
labels.description: Variable ball dip depth, timing issues

labels.name: fading_away
labels.description: Unnecessary backward or lateral movement

labels.name: low_release
labels.description: Ball released below optimal height

labels.name: early_release
labels.description: Releasing before reaching apex of jump

labels.name: elite_maintain
labels.description: Excellent mechanics, focus on consistency

labels.name: advanced_minor_tweaks
labels.description: Strong foundation, small adjustments

labels.name: intermediate_focused_work
labels.description: Solid base, specific areas need attention

labels.name: developing_major_corrections
labels.description: Multiple mechanical issues to address

labels.name: beginner_rebuild_needed
labels.description: Fundamental overhaul required

categories.name: overall_form_quality
categories.description: Comprehensive holistic evaluation of shooting form

labels.name: elite_textbook
labels.description: Professional-level mechanics across all categories

labels.name: excellent_form
labels.description: Very strong mechanics with minor imperfections

labels.name: good_solid_foundation
labels.description: Fundamentally sound with areas for improvement

labels.name: developing_needs_work
labels.description: Basic structure present, multiple corrections needed

labels.name: poor_significant_flaws
labels.description: Major mechanical issues throughout form

labels.name: needs_complete_rebuild
labels.description: Fundamental reconstruction required

annotation_guidelines.multi_label_approach: Each image should be labeled across ALL applicable categories. Not all categories apply to every image (e.g., shooting_phase depends on timing of photo).

image_requirements: Clear view of shooter's full body or relevant body segment
Adequate lighting to see joint angles
Basketball visible when relevant to category
annotation_accuracy: Use angle measurement tools when possible
Compare to reference images of elite shooters
Consider body type and shot type context

scoring_algorithm.composite_calculation: Weighted average of all applicable non-neutral categories
